net.antoniy.beacon
Interface BeaconDeviceEventListener

public interface BeaconDeviceEventListener

This interface is used by listeners of device related events and defines methods for handling the events.

Author:
Antoniy Chonkov

Method Summary
 void discoveredBeaconDevice(DeviceInfo deviceInfo)
          This method is responsible for handling the event when new device is discovered in the network.
 void removeBeaconDevice(DeviceInfo deviceInfo)
          This method is responsible for handling the event when the device hasn't send anything for a while and it's timeout has reached.
 void updateBeaconDevice(DeviceInfo deviceInfo)
          This method is responsible for handling the event when device change the meta data it broadcasts.
 

Method Detail

discoveredBeaconDevice

void discoveredBeaconDevice(DeviceInfo deviceInfo)
This method is responsible for handling the event when new device is discovered in the network.

Parameters:
deviceInfo - DeviceInfo instance that holds device specific information.
See Also:
DeviceInfo

updateBeaconDevice

void updateBeaconDevice(DeviceInfo deviceInfo)
This method is responsible for handling the event when device change the meta data it broadcasts.

Parameters:
deviceInfo - DeviceInfo instance that holds device specific information.

removeBeaconDevice

void removeBeaconDevice(DeviceInfo deviceInfo)
This method is responsible for handling the event when the device hasn't send anything for a while and it's timeout has reached. The device is considered not active and it's removed from the list of active devices.

Parameters:
deviceInfo - DeviceInfo instance that holds device specific information.
